Module org.im4r0ve
Package org.im4r0ve

Class Ant

java.lang.Object
org.im4r0ve.Ant
public class Ant
extends java.lang.Object
Implements all the decision making and movement of an ant. Each ant type has it's own specification.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ant

      public Ant​(AntGenome genome, Anthill anthill)

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step()
      Ant movement logic driver. Based on surroundings and current state determines what to do.

    • checkForDeath

      private boolean checkForDeath()
      Checks if the ant health is less or equal 0. If ant is carrying food he eats it and searches for some more.

    • searchArea

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> searchArea()
      Searches the surroundings of an ant by running BFS and storing shortest paths to all interests
      Returns:
      ArrayList of interest points in format: x,y,distance

    • cleanUpBFS

      private void cleanUpBFS​(int x, int y)
      Cleans up all the shortest paths and markings on the map after running searchArea().
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate of the start of searchArea().
      y - coordinate of the start of searchArea().

    • move

      private void move()
      Moves based on compass values multiplied by pheromone values in each direction. Compass is giving better probability of going straight from the anthill.

    • getCloser

      private void getCloser​(Tile target, int distance)
      When the ant finds something interesting he gets closer to it by shortest path.
      Parameters:
      target - tile to get closer to.
      distance - distance to the tile.

    • getCompass

      private double[] getCompass()
      Pointing away from anthill when an ants is in SEARCHING state. Points to anthill if the ant is in GOING_HOME state.
      Returns:
      double[] of probabilities for each direction in format: East, North, West, South

    • moveToTile

      private void moveToTile​(int x, int y)
      Teleports an ant to the x , y position.
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate to teleport to
      y - coordinate to teleport to

    • spreadPheromone

      private void spreadPheromone​(int x, int y)
      Adds pheromone to the pheromoneMap of corresponding anthill with coordinates x,y. Adds more if an ant is carying food.
      Parameters:
      x - coordinate
      y - coordinate

    • pickUpFood

      private void pickUpFood​(int food)
      Parameters:
      food - Food amount to pick up.

    • eatFromAnthill

      private void eatFromAnthill()
      Eats food from anthill. Called only if it is besides anthill.

    • getColor

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor()
      Returns:
      returns color of an ant

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Checks if the ant health is less or equal to 0
      Returns:
      true if the ant is dead
